Imagery Description: (a) Phlyax scene on a stage—seated Dionysos, with flute and thyrsus, watching female acrobat on stool; to right, whiteNon Sepcifiedhaired phlyax (mask L) bending forward, and another phlyax (mask B) looking on; above, in two windows, busts of women wearing white comic masks (XB and S), (b) maenad with situla and tambourine, bearded silen with right foot raised on rock, holding a torch in each hand
